q1.question: Do I need to know how to code?
q1.answer: No! Our models come ready to use. You just need to add your content through a simple and intuitive panel.

q2.question: How long does it take for the website to be ready?
q2.answer: After payment confirmation and information submission, your website is ready within 48 business hours.

q3.question: Is the domain included with the model?
q3.answer: No. Domain registration (.com, .net, etc.) is not included with the model purchase. You can register your domain through services like Namecheap or GoDaddy, and we handle all the technical setup for you.

q4.question: Can I cancel anytime?
q4.answer: Yes, you can cancel whenever you want. We offer a 30-day full refund guarantee.

q5.question: Is the website responsive?
q5.answer: All our models are 100% responsive and work perfectly on phones, tablets, and computers.

q6.question: Do I need technical knowledge to update the content?
q6.answer: No. We provide a simple admin panel where you can update texts, photos, and information without touching any code. If you need help, our support team is available.

q7.question: How does post-delivery support work?
q7.answer: All plans include WhatsApp support for questions and adjustments. The Professional and Elite plans include priority support with reduced response times and monthly maintenance included.

metadata.title: About Us — The Perse Digital Story
metadata.description: Perse, from Latin, By itself. Learn the story behind Perse Digital and why we create digital solutions for self-employed professionals.

hero.title: Perse,
hero.meaning: From Latin. Independent. Self-sufficient. Just like you.

story.title: Why does Perse Digital exist?
story.quote: My father is a bricklayer. My mother, a cleaner. Excellent professionals that nobody could find online.
story.p1: My father is a bricklayer. My mother, a cleaner. Both have always been self-employed professionals — and both have always been excellent at what they do. But for years, they remained hidden, relying solely on word-of-mouth to get clients.
story.p2: With that in mind, I decided to focus on creating websites and landing pages to help these kinds of professionals — who are increasingly sought after yet hard to find — get discovered on the internet.
story.p3: Perse Digital was born for this: to help self-employed professionals across many fields build their digital presence without depending on Instagram's algorithm or just word-of-mouth.

you.title: And you?
you.text: You want to create a website — otherwise you wouldn't be here. That's already a huge step toward professional growth! But you might still wonder: why is having a website worth it?

h247.title: Works for you 24/7
